description: HappyID helps you to identify who is calling you. The application shows you notes, company, position, birthday, closest event from the calendar and so on during the call. You could even sync all your notes with Evernote and Microsoft OneNote. HappyID is FREE and without ads.Please help us with translations: http://crowdin.com/project/happyid/inviteFor dual sim phones please activate "Dual-Sim" option in settings.
descriptionHTML:
HappyID helps you to identify who is calling you.

The application shows you notes, company, position, birthday, closest event from the calendar and so on during the call. You could even sync all your notes with Evernote and Microsoft OneNote.

HappyID is FREE and without ads.

Please help us with translations: http://crowdin.com/project/happyid/invite

For dual sim phones please activate "Dual-Sim" option in settings.
comments: Very nice app Very nice app. Wish it would sync with Google in addition to Evernote though. Still getting to know the app fully so my rating will most likely go up as I find additional features. Rating will definitely go up if it is ever able to sync with Google.
Plz add Google sync options for Notes
Great app Works fine with galaxy note 4
Super convenient It's great to have all that information right in front of you while you're talking to someone. It does help to be hands-free or have a headset
Great app It helps me a lot.
recentChanges: — A lot of bug fixes, optimisations and localization improvements
It would be great if you could give us a hand and translate this application into languages spoken by you: https://crowdin.com/project/happyid/invite
